jcr:root.jcr:description: Use this component to author a hero banner. Banner can include background with either image or color + a main image with an overlay heading (with rich text functionality), an overlay subheading (with rich text functionality). Text can be left, center or right aligned on the slide. Also able to add a CTA and decide on alignment/where click action opens.
jcr:root.jcr:title: Hero Image Banner
